title: Garmin launches Fenix 7 series and Epix outdoor smartwatches in India
content:
Garmin has expanded its wearable portfolio in India with the launch of the new Fenix 7 series and Epix. The lineup consists of the Garmin Fenix 7, Fenix 7 Solar, Fenix 7 Sapphire Solar, Fenix 7X Sapphire Solar, and Garmin Epix. Fenix 7 series The Fenix 7 sports a 1.3-inch AMOLED display with Corning Gorilla

The post Garmin launches Fenix 7 series and Epix outdoor smartwatches in India appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Garmin has launched the Fenix 7, Fenix 7 Solar, Fenix 7 Sapphire Solar, Fenix 7X Sapphire Solar and Garmin Epix in India.
